channel.title: Osint on Investigations by 0xFantasy
channel.description: Recent content in Osint on Investigations by 0xFantasy

item.title: Telegra.ph: Malware, Scams, and Leaked Government Docs (Kinda)
item.description: I’ve recently been doing some research regarding Telegram for work. This eventually led me to their sister platform, Telegra.ph. Simply put, Telegraph is a closed-source, minimalist, Pastebin-like site that allows anyone publish text-based content.

item.title: Investigating Hackers', Exploiters' Favorite Instant Crypto Exchange
item.description: If you’ve done any reading or sleuthing regarding the movements of funds after hacks, you’ve probably encountered eXchCX before. Incidents including but not limited to…

item.title: River Poker Casino Investigation
item.description: This is one of two articles based on "prompted" investigations. Starting out with an initial question and/or piece of media, the investigation is still open ended.
